overview_of_class: This course covers topics in acoustic phonetics and speech perception. In the first half of the course, the acoustic theory of speech production is introduced and the acoustic correlates of speech sounds are presented. We also cover acoustic-phonetic features of connected speech. In the second half of the course, we turn our attention to the perception of speech signals. We address such topics as phonetic categorization, speech perception and linguistic experience, and the role of speech perception in phonology.
name: Laboratory Phonology II
subject: LING
